dialogues.text: Why not? ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The van will be in free fall. I can't drop us with no gravity. Arthur finishes setting the charges.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saito moves through the lobby. Browning is coming in the other direction. Saito assumes him to be Eames. SAITO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see you've changed. BROWNING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry? Eames comes up behind Browning, catching Saito's eye. SAITO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm... I mistook you for a friend. BROWNING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good-looking fellow, I'm sure. Browning moves off. Saito approaches Eames. EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's Fischer's projection of Browning. We'll keep an eye on how he behaves- SAITO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why? EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How he acts will tell us if Fischer's starting to suspect his motives the way we want him to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb leads Fischer around a corner. Arthur and Ariadne ar waiting in the corridor. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They work for me. Fischer starts looking at room numbers. Stops at 528. Cob draws his gun, steps back from the door and KICKS it open

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb JUMPS into the room, gun up. The room is empty. Arth and Ariadne search the room. Saito and Eames arrive. Eame shuts the door. Arthur FINDS something- ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Charles! Arthur holds up a MECHANISM CASE. Cobb shows it to Fische COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what this is? Fischer's eyes roam over the dials and plungers. FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think so. But I don't understand. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They were going to put you under. FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm already under. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Under again. FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dream within a dream? ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhhh! Arthur is at the door. Someone is there. A key goes into lock- the door starts to open- Arthur REACHES OVER and GR the person entering, THROWS THEM TO THE FLOOR- puts his g in their face. IT IS BROWNING. Fischer stares, disbelieving, at his own godfather. FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uncle Peter. What's going on? Cobb pulls the key from Browning's hand: ROOM 528.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said you were kidnapped together? FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not exactly, they already had him. They'd been torturing him... COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You saw them torture him? Fischer shakes his head. Looks at Browning. Thinking. FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kidnappers are working for you. BROWNING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Robert- FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're trying to get that safe open. To get the alternate will. Browning looks up at Fischer. BROWNING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer Morrow's been my entire life. I can't let you destroy it. FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not going to throw away my inheritance. Why would I? BROWNING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I couldn't take the chance of you rising to your father's final taunt. FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What taunt? BROWNING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That will. I'm sorry, Robert, but it's his final insult. A challenge to build something for yourself. He's telling you that you aren't worthy of his achievements. Fischer takes this in. Devastated. FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That he was "disappointed?"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BROWNING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so sorry. But he was wrong. You'll make his company even greater than he ever could. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your godfather's lying, Robert. Fischer turns to Cobb. FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you know? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's what I do. He's hiding something. Cobb looks at Browning. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's find out what. Cobb nods at Arthur, who starts unpacking the mechanism. Browning watches. Silent. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's do to him what he was going to do to you. Cobb rolls up his sleeve. Nods at Fischer to do the same. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll penetrate his subconscious and find out what he doesn't want you to know. Fischer looks Cobb in the eye. Decides- rolls up his slee offering his bare arm. The team run tubes to each other- Arthur injects Fischer, whose head slumps. ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's out. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, Cobb-I'm lost. Whose subconscious are we going into? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer's. I told him it was Browning's so he'd come with us as part of our team. ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (impressed) He's going to help us break into his own subconscious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the idea. He'll think that his security is Browning's and fight them to learn the truth about his father. Arthur hits buttons on the mechanism. The team goes out o by one. Cobb is last. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer's subconscious is going to run you down hard. ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll lead them on a merry chase. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be back in time for the kick. ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm on it. Cobb is no longer listening- he stares at the net curtain BILLOWING like those in Mal's suite- a GLIMPSE of someone (Mal?) As the screen goes WHITE, and we are-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON Cobb's face, staring. Fixed. ARIADNE (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb? Cobb? Ariadne is beside him. They stand on a cliff, dressed in white snowsuits, carrying white-painted weapons like WWII commandos. Cobb checks his SNIPER RIFLE, examines their objective: a massive FORTIFIED MEDICAL FACILITY a mile be ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's down there? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hopefully, the truth we want Fischer to learn. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I meant what's down there for you? Cobb turns to her. Eames, Saito and Fischer arrive, SKIIN down from the hill above. Cobb pulls Eames out of Fischer earshot. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the dreamer. I need you to draw the security away from the complex.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then who guides Fischer in? You? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I know the route... we could be compromised. Eames looks as Cobb, uneasy. Ariadne comes over. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I designed the place. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. You're with me. SAITO (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could do it. They turn to Saito. Saito shrugs at Eames. Eames smiles. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames, brief Saito on the route into the complex. What we're looking for is going to be in the most heavily fortified section. That north tower. Cobb moves to Fischer. Saito COUGHS. SPITS. Eames sees BL on the snow. Looks at Saito. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Fischer, you're going in with Mr. Saito. FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not coming in? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to do this on your own. You have to get in there, break into your godfather's mind and find out the truth about your father. Cobb taps Fischer's radio mike. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep this live at all times. I'll be listening in, covering you. (holds up the sniper rifle) The windows on the upper floors are big enough that I can cover you from that south tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb slips into his skis, shoulders his rifle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur checks the mechanism. He hears LOW BOOMS like thun He checks his watch- THE SECOND HAND CRAWLS FORWARDS. Wit last look at the sleepers, he heads out into the corridor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A GUNSHOT slams into the van as Yusuf DRIVES- he glances to see a MOTORCYCLE pulling up behind him, the REAR PASSE FIRING A SHOTGUN- the bike pulls alongside Yusuf's window the passenger RELOADS- Yusuf YANKS the wheel TOWARDS the bike, bringing the shotgun barrel into the cab so he can it, spin the wheel back- PULLING the passenger from the b of the bike... Yusuf turns a corner, heading into a disus

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur walks towards the elevator. It OPENS- a SECURITY M emerges, heading right for him. Arthur takes a TURN, spee up. The BOOMS are louder, and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bike crosses behind the van, catching up again as the driver pulls a handgun and starts BLASTING. Up ahead, an S.U.V. sits in a side road, lining up to head off the van the SECURITY MAN driving the S.U.V. guns it, as the bike creeps up on the other side of the van- Yusuf HITS THE BRAKES, forcing the bike out into the path of the S.U.V., tossing the rider like a rag doll- Heading out of the market, the van races onto a FREEWAY O RAMP, approaching the BRIDGE. An S.U.V. SMASHES into the van's side, FORCING it up against a CRASH BARRIER... the starts to SLOWLY TILT OVER THE BARRIER as the S.U.V. PUSH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Arthur hurries down the corridor, the corridor starts TILT, and Arthur is forced to run UP ONTO THE WALL- he ro a corner- STRAIGHT INTO another Security Man- Arthur HEAD BUTTS him and they STRUGGLE- as they struggle, the corrid SPINS around, THROWING THEM UP ONTO THE WALLS, THE CEILIN as wall becomes floor they DROP through a door into-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fight continues all over the spinning room- and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SLEEPING ARTHUR BOUNCES around as the van TILTS, SCRAPING along the barrier- the van CLEARS THE END OF THE BARRIER ROLLS DOWN THE EMBANKMENT, and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur and the Security Man DROP to the floor, Arthur on Arthur gets up- heads to the stairwell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The van SETTLES with a thump. Yusuf BREATHES hard. Then SMILES as he realizes he is in one piece. A RINGING BELL ahead makes him look up to the bridge, where the barriers starting to come down. Yusuf checks his watch- YUSUF

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bugger. Yusuf hits the gas, heading for the bridge. An S.U.V. lin up behind him, trying to catch up before the van crosses barrier onto the bridge- The van JUST MAKES IT- the S.U.V. behind RIPS its read ax off, SCRAPING to a halt on the rising section. The Securi Man inside starts FIRING on the van...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur RACES down the steps- OPENS the door to the fourth floor- spots SECURITY MEN outside room 491. ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! They TURN- he DARTS back into the stairwell- RACES down t stairs- the Security Men follow- they start SHOOTING, and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames SKIS down within sight of the hospital complex. He reaches into his pack and lets off a FLARE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Security Men on the ramparts spot the flare and send PATR out on skis and SNOWMOBILES to investigate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames watches them close in, then launches himself down t mountain, STREAKING across the icy slope, and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yusuf PULLS FORWARD, looking over his shoulder to line up BACKWARDS RUN at the edge. He DUCKS as vicious FIRE from S.U.V. HAMMERS the vehicle. He looks at his watch. The SE HAND TICKING SLOWLY... YUSUF

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sod it. I hope your ready. He grabs an MP3 player and reaches into the back to place HEADPHONES on sleeping Arthur's head. As he does so, he notices Saito's bandage BLEEDING THROUGH. Yusuf hits PLAY Edith Piaf's "Non, je ne regrette rien" starts up and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur STOPS, hearing something- MASSIVE LOW-END MUSICAL TONES- he looks up PANICKED- ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Yusuf. Too soon! SHOTS slam into the stairs around him and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb and Ariadne make their way down towards the complex. EAMES (OVER RADIO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb? Are you hearing that? Cobb listens. The wind sounds unusually LOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames is hidden at the base of some trees, whispering as patrol passes beneath his position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I noticed it twenty minutes ago-at first I thought it was just wind...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb is listening intently. The "wind" changes pitch. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it's music. Dammit. EAMES (OVER RADIO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do we do? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We move fast. Saito, did you copy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saito and Fischer CLIMB down a CLIFF FACE above the compl SAITO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going as fast as we can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariadne looks at Cobb, concerned. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long do we have? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yusuf's about ten seconds from the jump, which gives Arthur about three minutes, which gives us about- ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sixty minutes. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The route you gave them, can they do it in under an hour? ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think so. They've still got to climb down to the middle terrace. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They need a new route-a direct route. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The building's designed as a labyrinth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There must be access routes that cut through the maze. (into radio) Eames?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames cannot answer- he SLALOMS through the forest, Sub- security in hot pursuit, bullets smashing into the trunks

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb turns to Ariadne. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did Eames add any features? ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did he add? Ariadne looks at Cobb. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I shouldn't tell you. If Mal- COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no time-what did he add? ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Utility closets, trap doors... COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about service features? Did he add any large pipes or- ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ducts. He added an air duct system- it doesn't follow the maze. They can use it to go straight from the outer walls to the upper tower. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Explain it to them. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into radio) Saito?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saito is using a hammer to tap in a belay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SAITO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead. And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yusuf looks at the Security Man in the S.U.V., gives him finger and hits the GAS- RACING BACKWARDS at the barrier. and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur RUNS UP the stairs, gun in hand- rounds a corner a IMPOSSIBLY- arrives behind the Security Man, who looks at him, CONFUSED, then looks down to realize he is now at th edge of a dangerous drop- Arthur shrugs. ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paradox. Arthur PUSHES him over the edge- he falls- Arthur races u the fourth floor- throws open the door- and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In SLOW MOTION- the van SMASHES THROUGH THE CONCRETE BARR and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur is SPRINTING down the corridor when a TREMENDOUS C sends him FLYING into the air- and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MASSIVE RUMBLE prompts Cobb to look across the valley-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames shoots out of the trees, then FALLS to the snow as sees a great CRACKING up ahead- the SLOPE IS FALLING AWAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saito hears the RUMBLE above them. He looks down, Fischer below, near the bottom of the sheer face- SAITO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look out! Saito CUTS the rope- they FALL- HIT the icy face and SLID down the slope, clearing the path of the avalanche- and w

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In EXTREME SLOW MOTION, the van emerges from the concrete balustrade and starts FALLING- and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur is still FLYING through the corridor, NOT LANDING- GRAVITY HAS DISAPPEARED... he scrambles for a handhold, GRABBING a sconce- and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb watches the avalanche cloud slide past the complex. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kick. EAMES (OVER RADIO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb? Did we miss it? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, we missed it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames is lying on the snow. EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell do we do now? COBB (OVER RADIO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finish the job before the next kick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What next kick?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb looks at Ariadne as he talks into the radio. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When the van hits the water. I figure Arthur's got a couple minutes and we've got about twenty. Cobb and Ariadne MOVE towards the base of the complex.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saito and Fischer RUN around the base of the building. Th find a large EXHAUST PORT. Lay a charge on the GRILL. The blow the charge. Climb into the open vent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In EXTREME SLOW MOTION, the van seems SUSPENDED IN MID-AI TEN STORIES ABOVE THE RIVER... and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In ZERO GRAVITY, Arthur pulls himself to the door of 491, opens it. He looks at the charges planted on the ceiling. ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How the hell do I drop you? He PULLS the charges from the ceiling. Hurrying. And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saito and Fischer hurry through the duct system. Saito is falling behind, coughing up blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb GRABS a Security Guard from behind, strangling him unconscious. He beckons to Ariadne, covering her as she r towards him. They enter the base of the south tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A guard is manning the tower. Cobb and Ariadne enter- Cob SHOOTS the guard and moves to the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (she points) That's the antechamber outside the strongroom. Cobb looks at the large windows of the antechamber. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about the strongroom? Doesn't it have any windows? ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wouldn't be very strong if it did. (off look) Look, if you wanted to design it yourself- COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fine. Better hope that we like what Fischer finds in there. Cobb sets up his sniper rifle. Through the scope he can s three guards on the balcony outside the chamber. Three mo inside. Cobb casually picks them off with his rifle. Aria watches through binoculars, appalled. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These projections, they're part of his subconscious? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you destroying those parts of his mind? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, of course not. They're just projections. EAMES (OVER RADIO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb? Something's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames is watching the patrols HEAD BACK towards the compl EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're heading your way. Like they know something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb hears this. Concerned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buy us some time. EAMES (OVER RADIO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On my way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames TAKES OFF towards the base of the complex. And we=

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur FLOATS into the room. The SLEEPERS are floating, loosely connected by their tubes. Arthur looks at them, M RACING. He PULLS Cobb towards Eames, and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saito and Fischer approach the grate covering the exit to anteroom. Saito SLUMPS to the floor of the duct, pulls ou his radio. Fischer looks at him- he is PALE, SHIVERING. Fischer takes the radio, WHISPERS into it. FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into radio) We're here. Are we clear to proceed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb SCANS the anteroom through the scope-it looks clear. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're clear, but hurry-there's an army headed your way... Ariadne watches the patrols approaching the complex...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SQUELCH from the radio is too loud- Fischer GRABS it turns the volume to zero as he starts to remove the grate

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames is setting MINES along the LOWEST WALL of the structure. He moves carefully-there is a SHEER DROP below wall...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb SPOTS something through his scope. Something above t main windows, glimpsed through the side of the skylight. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit. There's someone else in there. Cobb prepares to fire. Ariadne GRABS the radio- ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer, stop! It's a trap!-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer does not see the flashing light on his radio as h carefully lifts the grate. He motions for Saito to stay..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb TENSES to fire. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on... a little lower... a little- COBB FREEZES- IT IS MAL IN HIS SIGHTS. Ariadne puts up he binoculars. Spots Mal. Fischer is climbing out of the ven ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb, that's not really her- Cobb turns to her- COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can you know that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer moves into the antechamber, cautious- FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm in. Fischer turns up the volume- ARIADNE (OVER RADIO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer, look out!- Mal DROPS gracefully to the floor behind him- MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb looks at Ariadne- ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb, she's just a projection. Fischer... he's real. Cobb thinks. Nods, TURNS back to the scope- too late- MAL SHOOTS FISCHER- Cobb reflexively pulls the trigger- Mal G DOWN- Cobb steps back from the scope, STUNNED. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames? Get to the anteroom now! They run for the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saito STARTS as he hears the shot. He starts edging forwa clutching his belly. And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sleepers are floating in a rough stack, top-and-taile Arthur pulls the bedding from the bed and uses the sheet bind the sleepers together. And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In EXTREME SLOW MOTION, the van CREEPS DOWNWARDS, still h above the river... and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur PUSHES the floating stack of sleepers to the eleva He hits the button- the doors open- he pushes them in- GR the charges- climbs through the hatch in the ceiling and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames steps over Saito, who looks up at him with DYING ey

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames jumps out of the vent to find Cobb and Ariadne stan over the bodies of Fischer and Mal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened? ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mal killed Fischer- COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldn't shoot her. Eames grabs a defibrillator from the wall and pulls Fisch jacket open- COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It won't do any good- Eames SHOCKS Fischer's chest... COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even if you could revive his body, his mind's trapped down there. It's over. Eames listens for a pulse. Looks up at Cobb. EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So that it, then? We failed. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's you who doesn't get back to your family. Eames looks down at Fischer. Then over to the double door EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wanted to know what was going to happen in there. I think we had this one. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's still a way: We follow Fischer down- They look at her. EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're almost out of time- ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Down there they'll be enough time. We'll find him-soon as you hear Arthur's music start, you use the defibrillator to revive him-we give him his own early kick from below. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ARIADNE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get him in there- (points to doors) Then, as the music ends you blow the hospital and we all ride the kick back up through the layers. Eames looks at her, then to Cobb. EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, Saito can hold them off while I plant the rest of the charges. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saito's not going to last, Eames. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to try! EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go for it, but I'm taking the kick whether you're back or not... Eames pulls the mechanism from his pack. Offers it to Ariadne. Cobb watches. Silent. Ariadne pulls out the tube ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I trust you to do what's needed? Mal's down there- COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I can find her. She'll have Fischer. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you know? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She wants me to come after him. She wants me back down there with her. Cobb rolls up his sleeve. Ariadne rolls up her own sleeve Eames NODS. Cobb and Ariadne lie down. Eames hits the but WATER. BUBBLES. DROWNING. And we are-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariadne lies in the SURF, STARING up at a CLOUDLESS SKY. tremendous BOOM prompts her to look around her- URBAN BUILDINGS PILED right down to the water. The buildings ar DECAYING, falling into the ocean like a GLACIER calving. WADES towards her through the shallow water. Ariadne look at the crumbling city around them. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is your world?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was. And this is where she'll be. And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur floats on top of the elevator, planting small char on the EMERGENCY BRAKES and CABLE. He sets them, GRABS th other explosives, then PUSHES AWAY, shooting up the shaft he hits the DETONATOR, BLASTING the braking and safety systems of the elevator, we move into SLOW MOTION, the fireballs FLAMING OUT in graceful licks and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames RACES around, full speed- getting the defibrillator paddles- laying them by Fischer's body- he runs into the pulls Saito up to a seated position and hands him a handg EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Saito. I need you to cover Fischer while I plant the charges. Saito nods weakly, tries to hold the gun. Eames moves to window- pulls his machine gun off- checks its load. Ready watches the security patrols climb up the outer walls... Eames lays down a HAIL of covering fire- then heads outsi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames races along the upper terrace dodging fire- BULLETS SHATTER a window behind him and we move into SLOW MOTION, glass CASCADING GENTLY and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb and Ariadne climb out of the waves, full speed. They move into the shadow of the tall, crumbling buildings. Th streets are eerily DESERTED. As they move further in, the buildings become NEWER, different. Ariadne marvels at the extraordinary collection of buildings- every architectura style imaginable in waves of FAILED UTOPIAS. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You built all this? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We both did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's incredible. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We built for years. Then, when that got stale, we started in on the memories. A child's SHOUT echoes through the deserted canyons, prompting Cobb to look down a side street: a LITTLE BLOND BOY crouched, his back to us. A LITTLE BLONDE GIRL joins boy, and, as Cobb turns down the street, they run off. Cobb and Ariadne emerge into a peculiar SQUARE lined with eclectic mix of buildings, from APARTMENT BLOCKS to HOUSE COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is our neighborhood. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (confused) From what city? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Our neighborhood. (pointing) That was our first apartment... then we moved to that building... we got that small house when Mal became pregnant. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You reconstructed them all from memory? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We had time. Cobb pauses in front of a French country house. Staring. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The house Mal grew up in. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will she be in there? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Come on- Cobb leads Ariadne to the entrance of a glass skyscraper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb leads Ariadne across the gleaming lobby to the elevators. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We both wanted a house, but we both loved skyscrapers. In the real world we had to choose. Not here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb pulls out his handgun, and a ziplock bag full of bullets. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do we send Fischer back? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need some kind of kick. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll improvise. Cobb COCKS his weapon, and the ELEVATOR STOPS. The doors open. Ariadne moves to exit, Cobb stops her. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's something you have to understand about me. About inception. You see, an idea is like a virus... Cobb leads her out of the lift...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb and Ariadne step off the lift and into the incongruo interior of a craftsman house. They cautiously move down corridor towards the back of the house... COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Resilient... (turns to Ariadne) Highly contagious, and an idea can grow. The smallest seed of an idea can grow to define or destroy your world... Cobb is staring into the kitchen. Mal is sitting at the table, back to them, staring out at the porch- the TOWERS Limbo stretching off behind it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The smallest idea, such as... "Your world is not real." Cobb hands Ariadne his gun and moves towards Mal. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A simple little thought that changes everything... Ariadne watches as Cobb sits down beside Mal. And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur FLIES back down the shaft to the top of the elevat SQUEEZES past the car to the bottom and starts to set the MAIN CHARGES ACROSS THE BOTTOM OF THE CAR, and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb touches Mal's arm- she TURNS, angry. It is only now we see that she holds a CARVING KNIFE. Mal looks at Ariad MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So certain of your world. Of what's real. Do you think he is- (points at Cobb) Or do you think he's as lost as I was? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know what's real. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are the distinguishing characteristics of a dream? Mutable laws of physics? Tell that to the quantum physicists. Reappearance of the dead? What about heaven and hell? Persecution of the dreamer, the creator, the messiah? They crucified Christ, didn't they? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know what's real. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No creeping doubts? Not feeling persecuted, Dom? Chased around the globe by anonymous corporations and police forces? The way the projections persecute the dreamer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mal puts her hand on his face. Pitying. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Admit it, Dom. You don't believe in one reality anymore. So choose. Choose your reality like I did. Choose to be here. Choose me. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rising anger) I have chosen, Mal. Our children. I have to get back to them. Because you left them. You left us. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're wrong, Dom. You're confused... our children are here- A child's SHOUT draws Cobb- James CROUCHES on the porch, to us. Philippa joins him, also turned away. Cobb watches moved. Mal leans in close. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers) And you'd like to see their faces again, wouldn't you, Dom? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our real children are waiting for me up above. And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur scrambles to arrange the sleepers on the floor of car- as his hand comes away from Saito, he sees BLOOD on He looks at Saito's belly- the blood is coming through hi shirt. Arthur sticks headphones on sleeping Eames, and we

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames throws a GRENADE, blowing up the security forces tr to ascend the terraces. He DUCKS to the ground to avoid H FIRE- starts unpacking the charges and setting them along base of the terraces-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saito looks up as he hears a Security Guard climbing thro the duct... he raises his gun, TREMBLING with weakness... And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mal laughs at Cobb. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughs) Up above? Listen to yourself. You judged me for believing the very same thing. Mal points at the children- MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These are our children. Watch. (turns to the kids) Hey, James! Philippa?! The children START TO TURN to us- BUT COBB CLOSES HIS EYE COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're not real, Mal. Our real children are waiting for us- The children run off. Cobb opens his eyes. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You keep telling yourself that but you don't believe it- COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know it- MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what if you're wrong? What if I'm what's real? Cobb is silent. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You keep telling yourself what you know... but what do you believe? What do you feel? Cobb looks at Mal. Struggling. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guilt. I feel guilt. And however confused I might get. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COBB (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: However lost I might seem... it's always there. Telling me something. Reminding me of the truth. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What truth? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That you were wrong to doubt our world. That the idea that drove you to question your reality was a lie... MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How could you know it was a lie? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because it was my lie. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (realizing) Because you planted the idea in my mind. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because I performed inception on my own wife, then reaped the bitter rewards... ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'd become lost in here. Living in a world of infinite possibilities. A world where we were gods. I realized we needed to escape, but she'd locked away her knowledge of the unreality of this world... INSERT CUT: Mal opens the doll's house. Takes the spinnin top, lies it down in the safe. LOCKS IT AWAY. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I couldn't make Mal understand that we needed to break free. To die. So I started to search our world... Cobb turns to Mal, but keeps talking to Ariadne... INSERT CUT: Cobb WANDERS the streets of Limbo... COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Searching for the right place in her mind...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INSERT CUT: Cobb stops outside the VICTORIAN HOUSE, MAL'S CHILDHOOD HOME, looking up at it. He heads inside... COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And when I found that place, that secret place where she had shut away her knowledge years before, I broke it open... INSERT CUT: Cobb looks around Mal's childhood bedroom. Co to the doll's house... COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I broke into the deepest recess of her mind, to give her the simplest little idea. INSERT CUT: Cobb throws open the safe doors. Sitting on t shelf of the safe is a spinning top. On its side. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A truth that she had once known, but had chosen to forget... INSERT CUT: Cobb picks up the totem. He SPINS it in the s IT SPINS AND SPINS WITHOUT END. Cobb CLOSES THE DOOR of t safe... COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That her world was not real.

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH WASTELAND.
dialogues.text: COBB (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That death was a necessary escape. They lie on the tracks looking into each other's eyes. Ma crying. Cobb takes her hand, reassuring. He starts to spe COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're waiting for a train. A train that will take you far away. You know where you hope this train will take you, but you can't know for sure. Yet it doesn't matter... Mal looks at him across the railroad tracks. Replies- MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you'll be together. The train comes, OBLITERATING the lovers. Back in the present- Cobb looks into Mal's eyes. She is crying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never thought that the idea I'd planted would grow in her mind like a cancer. That even after we woke... INSERT CUT: Cobb looks around the HOTEL SUITE, confused. moves to the CURTAINS... Mal is on the ledge opposite. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'd continue to believe that your world was not real... Crying, Mal nods- MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That death was the only escape? INSERT CUT: Mal PLUNGES to her death. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You killed me. Cobb looks at Mal. Whispers- COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was trying to save you-I'm sorry. Mal comes in close to Cobb. Looks him over. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You infected my mind. You betrayed me. But you can make amends. You can still keep your promise. We can still be together... right here. In our world. The world we built together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur hits "Play" on his music player- Edith Piaf starts ring out, Arthur checks his detonator and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames races back in- in the relative quiet he notices MAS LOW-E MUSICAL TONES. He drops his gun and goes to Fischer side...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saito musters all his remaining strength as the guard eme Saito FIRES, dropping the guard, then COLLAPSES, the gun clattering to the duct floor... Saito is dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames powers up the defibrillator, puts the paddles on Fischer's chest, then Pow!- he shocks him, and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIGHTNING crackles across the sky- Ariadne sees it. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need Fischer. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't have him. Cobb stares at Mal. Mesmerized. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I stay, can she take him back? ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb, what are you saying? MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer's on the porch. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb, you can't do this. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go check he's alive, Ariadne. Ariadne moves onto the porch, high above the metropolis, we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur nods his head in time with the music, counting dow holding the detonator. He starts bracing himself, and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames recharges the defibrillator. SHOCKS Fischer again, we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariadne looks up as a LARGE BOLT OF LIGHTNING RIPS across sky... she looks down to see Fischer, BOUND AND BLOODY, l below the rail. ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's here. And it's time. But you have to come with us. Another massive lightning strike flickers across the sky- ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb, I'm not going to let you lose yourself in here! You have to get back to your children! COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Send Fischer, I have to stay- ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't stay here to be with her- Cobb turns from Mal. Looks at Ariadne. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not. Saito is dead by now. That means he's here. I have to stay here and find him. Ariadne removes Fischer's gag- pulls him up, onto the rai Cobb looks back at Mal. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't stay here to be with her because she's not real. Mal looks at Cobb, furious. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not real? I'm the only thing you do believe in anymore. Here-doesn't this feel real, Dom? She STABS him in the chest- Cobb WHEEZES- GASPING, lookin Mal-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wish you were. But I couldn't make you real. I'm not capable of imagining you in all your complexity and... perfection. As you really were. You're the best I can do. And you're not real. Mal pulls the knife and moves to STRIKE again- ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! A SHOT rings out, Mal GRABS her shoulder- Cobb turns to Ariadne, who is pointing Cobb's gun. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you doing? ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Improvising. She KICKS Fischer off the roof- AIMS again at Mal- Fischer DROPS as the sky LIGHTS UP WITH ELECTRICITY- Fisc SCREAMS, then GASPS, no longer falling, and we are-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames pulls the defibrillator from Fischer's chest as he COUGHS AWAKE. EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get in there-quick! Fischer looks up at the double doors. STAGGERS to his fee Fischer pushes open the doors to the STRONGROOM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer walks into the silent white room. At one end of t room is a bed. A figure lies in the bed. His FATHER. Breathing with tremendous difficulty. Dying. And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariadne takes aim at Mal- COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Cobb holds Ariadne's gaze. She lowers the gun. And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames GRABS the detonator- then moves to the door of the strongroom...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur HITS THE DETONATOR-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CHARGES on the bottom of the elevator EXPLODE, and we move into EXTREME SLOW MOTION as the flames BALLOON-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A RUMBLE BUILDS as Fischer approaches the bed, overcome w emotion. His Father sees him. Starts trying to speak. Fis leans in... FATHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hoarse whisper) I... was ... dis ... dis ... FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, Dad. You were disappointed that I couldn't be you. The dying man SHAKES HIS HEAD with surprising energy. FATHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whisper) I was disappointed... that you tried. Fischer hears this. And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator car is ROCKETED along its track by the explo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur is SMASHED against the floor of the car next to th sleepers who SHUDDER with the force of ACCELERATION- and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eames WATCHES Fischer-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EAMES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself) ) Come on, come on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Father collapses back onto the pillow. Fischer starts weep. His Father reaches out a trembling hand but when Fischer tries to hold IT, he SHAKES his son's hand away.. He is reaching for the SAFE next to his bed. His fingers fumble at the keypad, he can't open it. His son pushes 5,2,8,4,9,1 into the keypad. Opens it. Inside the safe is WILL. And beside it is a HOMEMADE PINWHEEL, clearly made child. By Fischer. He takes it out, MARVELING at it. He t to his father, but his father is dead. Eames, watching from the door, HITS THE DETONATOR-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A line of EXPLOSIONS RIPS ALONG THE LOWER WALL... the ENT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FIERCE WIND starts HOWLING through the house as the sky outside DARKENS. Cobb shields Mal against the blast- look at Ariadne, who HOLDS the railing, FIGHTING the wind- COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the kick-you have to go! ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're coming! COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm not. I'm staying here to find Saito. (turns to Mal) And to say goodbye. Ariadne loosens her grip on the railing... ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't lose yourself. Find Saito. And bring him back. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will. Ariadne lets the wind pull her off the edge- FALLING- and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariadne DROPS as the FLOOR COLLAPSES- her eyes SNAP OPEN-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb holds Mal in his arms. The wind DIES... MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'd be together forever. You promised me. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. But we can't. And I'm sorry. MAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You remember when you asked me to marry you? You said you dreamt that we'd grow old together. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we did... Mal looks at Cobb... thinking. Remembering.

dialogues.speaker: OTHER AS THEY LIE DOWN ON THE RAILROAD TRACK...
dialogues.text: COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I miss you more than I can bear... but we had our time together. And now I have to let go... She nods, weakly. Cobb holds Mal as her eyes close... DYING... and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer and his Father's body DROP AWAY-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariadne DROPS inside the ROCKETING ELEVATOR, and as it SMASHES INTO THE TOP OF THE SHAFT Ariadne SMASHES into-

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH THE BROKEN WINDOWS FLOODING THE INTERIOR...
dialogues.text: Fischer's EYES OPEN, PANICKING- he UNBUCKLES HIMSELF, pus out of the broken window- STOPS, goes back to UNBUCKLE Browning and DRAG him out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer breaks the surface with Browning, who COUGHS and GASPS. He starts PULLING for the near bank, struggling through the rain-impacted water-

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUOUS
dialogues.text: Ariadne, Arthur and Yusuf wait calmly underwater. They ar sharing TWO REGULATORS pulled from beneath the front seat Arthur turns to Saito. There is blood in the water around Saito's belly- his eyes are LIFELESS- Arthur feels for a pulse... turns to Cobb, whose eyes are lifeless... Ariadn GRABS Arthur's elbow, pulling him away...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer turns Browning/Eames over. They lie there, exhaus BROWNING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Robert. Fischer stares at the rain on the water. FISCHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The will means that Dad wanted me to be my own man, not live for him. (turns to Browning) ) And I'm going to, Uncle Peter. Browning nods. Wipes the rain from his face. In the puddl beside them, the reflection is not Browning, but Eames.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arthur sits on the riverbank, breathing heavily. ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened? ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb stayed. ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With Mal? ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. To find Saito. Arthur looks out at the water below the bridge. ARTHUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll be lost... ARIADNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. He'll be alright.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The waves TOSS a BEARDED MAN onto wet sand. As the Japanese Security Guard turns him onto his back, w realize that this is Cobb- OLDER. WEARY. TRAVELLED...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb WOLFS his food. The Elderly Japanese Man (Saito, 90 years old) watches him. SAITO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... have you come to kill me? Cobb does not look up. SAITO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been waiting for someone to come for me... COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone from your half-remembered dream...? Saito peers at Cobb. SAITO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb? Not possible-he and I were young men together. And I am an old man... COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Filled with regret? Saito REMEMBERS, nods... SAITO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waiting to die alone, yes. Cobb is STARING at something on the table. COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I came back for you... I came to remind you of what you once knew... Cobb gestures at the table. Saito follows his gaze down t the polished surface of the table... COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That this world is not real.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The top IS STILL SPINNING PERFECTLY, AS IF IT WILL NEVER TOPPLE. Saito looks at the top. Then back to Cobb. SAITO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You came to convince me to honor our arrangement? COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. And to take a leap of faith. As Saito-san listens to Cobb, he looks at the GUN on the table between them... COBB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come back and we'll be young men together again. The elderly Saito looks at Cobb. Nods. And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariadne watches Cobb. His eyes are closed. FLIGHT ATTENDANT (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hot towel, sir? His EYES FLICKER OPEN. He takes the towel with a nod. Ari smiles. Relieved. FLIGHT ATTENDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll be landing in Los Angeles in about twenty minutes. Do you need immigration forms? Cobb nods. Takes a landing card. Looks around the cabin. Saito is WATCHING him. Serious. Haunted. Holding Cobb's g SAITO PICKS UP THE PHONE AND DIALS. Cobb nods thanks...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb steps forwards to the IMMIGRATION OFFICIAL. Hands hi his passport. Nervous. The Official takes a beat, looks C up and down, then WHUMP!- the passport is stamped. As Cob takes it back, he spots Ariadne at the next counter. She at him. He nods back. Then moves off... As Cobb passes through baggage claim, he exchanges subtle greetings with Eames and Yusuf. Arthur smiles broadly at Cobb. Cobb brushes past Fischer, glances back at him as if thinking maybe he should know h then moves on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Cobb emerges into the crowded arrivals hall, he spots Professor Miles, waving at him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb enters with Miles. Drops his bags. Moves to the tabl looking out at the overgrown garden. He reaches into his pocket, takes out his pewter spinning top, lowers it to t table and SPINS IT- a CHILD'S SHOUT makes him look up- Through the window, James and Philippa have run into view playing, THEIR FACES TURNED AWAY... Cobb STARES at the ba of his children's heads... Miles moves to the window and KNOCKS on the glass- James and Philippa TURN- see their Dad. He steps to the window, watching their BRIGHT FACES SHINING as they run towards him... Behind him, on the table, the spinning top is STILL SPINN And we- FADE OUT. CREDITS. END.
